snippet.title: File:ShostakovichRadio1941.ogg
snippet.description: composer Dmitri Shostakovich from the besieged city of Leningrad in 1941. ... to me now will know that the life of our city goes on as normal. ...

snippet.title: Category:Lev Tolstoy (ship, 1981)
snippet.description: IMO number : 7625809 Name of ship : OCEAN LIFE (since 01/10/2010) Call Sign : 9HGB9 ... Tolstoy Category:Dmitriy Shostakovich class passenger ships ...
